title: Find Your Perfect Dietitian
description: Answer a few quick questions so we can match you with the right registered dietitian, confirm your insurance benefits, and help you pay $0 out-of-pocket.

questions.text: What's the main reason for your visit?
questions.helpText: We'll use this to find your perfect match.

questions.text: What else can we support you with?
questions.helpText: Choose all that apply so we can match you with the right dietitian.

questions.text: Which insurance plan do you have?
questions.helpText: We work with most major insurance companies.

validation.message: Please enter a valid member ID.

questions.text: Which state do you live in?
questions.helpText: We'll use this to match you with a dietitian licensed in your state.

questions.heading: Great news!
questions.text: 94% of patients have coverage and pay $0 out-of-pocket when working with our dietitians.

questions.helpText: By clicking continue, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted the Curalife Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

validation.message: Please enter a valid email address.

questions.helpText: By clicking continue you agree to receive benefit results and occasional marketing text messages from Curalife. You can opt-out anytime.

validation.message: Please enter a valid phone number.

questions.heading: You are in luck!
